page.description: The A5_GENERIC_PRINT() function prints the text in a text object in an Xdialog form using the default printer.

argument.name: pointer
argument.description: A dot variable containing the text displayed in the control.

page.example: dim ptext as P dim ptext.text as C dim ptext.object as P ptext.text = "some text" ui_dlg_box("title",<<%dlg% [.20ptext]; ; %dlg%,<<%code% if (a_dlg_button = "Print") then a5_generic_print(ptext) a_dlg_button = "" end if %code%)
